glsa.title: Adobe Flash Player: Multiple vulnerabilities
glsa.synopsis: Multiple vulnerabilities have been found in Adobe Flash Player, the worst of which could result in execution of arbitrary code.

background.p: The Adobe Flash Player is a renderer for the SWF file format, which is commonly used to provide interactive websites.

description.p: Multiple vulnerabilities have been discovered in Adobe Flash Player. Please review the CVE identifiers referenced below for details.

impact.p: A remote attacker could entice a user to open a specially crafted SWF file using Adobe Flash Player, possibly resulting in execution of arbitrary code with the privileges of the process or a Denial of Service condition. Furthermore, a remote attacker may be able to bypass the Same Origin Policy or read the clipboard via unspecified vectors.

workaround.p: There is no known workaround at this time.
